dsl_rule: ASSOCIATED(field1, field2, 'Each CSI Resource Setting is located in the DL BWP identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id')
predicate: Each CSI Resource Setting (csi-rs-resourcesetlist) is located in the DL BWP (bwp-id) identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id

valid: csi-rs-resourcesetlist: {CSI Resource Setting 1, CSI Resource Setting 2}, bwp-id: 1
invalid: csi-rs-resourcesetlist: {CSI Resource Setting 1, CSI Resource Setting 2}, bwp-id: 2

notes: The association is based on the location of the CSI Resource Setting in the DL BWP identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id

meta.evidence: Each CSI Resource Setting CSI-ResourceConfig contains a configuration of a list of S \( \geq 1 \) CSI Resource Sets (given by higher layer parameter csi-RS-ResourceSetList), where the list is comprised of references to either or both of NZP CSIRS resource set(s) and SS/PBCH block set(s) or the list is comprised of references to CSI-[M resource set(s). Each CSI Resource Setting is located in the DL BWP identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id, and all CSI Resource Settings linked to a CSI Report Setting have the same DL BWP.

full_api_response.dsl: ASSOCIATED(field1, field2, 'Each CSI Resource Setting is located in the DL BWP identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id')
full_api_response.predicate: Each CSI Resource Setting (csi-rs-resourcesetlist) is located in the DL BWP (bwp-id) identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id

valid: csi-rs-resourcesetlist: {CSI Resource Setting 1, CSI Resource Setting 2}, bwp-id: 1
invalid: csi-rs-resourcesetlist: {CSI Resource Setting 1, CSI Resource Setting 2}, bwp-id: 2

full_api_response.notes: The association is based on the location of the CSI Resource Setting in the DL BWP identified by the higher layer parameter BWP-id
